testcase.name: Validate login page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on login page.................................................passed Then Username field is displayed............................................passed And Password field is displayed.............................................passed And Login field is displayed................................................passed And Keep me login checkbox is displayed.....................................passed And Actitime logo is displayed..............................................passed And Login page title is displayed as "actiTIME - Login".....................passed And Login page URL is displayed as "http://localhost:90/login.do"...........passed

testcase.name: Login successfully
testcase.system-out: Given User is on login page.................................................passed When User enter Username....................................................passed And User enter Password.....................................................passed And Click on login button...................................................passed Then Dashboard URL should be displayed "http://localhost:90/user/submit_tt.do".passed And Dashboard page title should be displayed "actiTIME - Enter Time-Track"..passed
